com.software.reuze

Interface aa_i_PolicyEvaluation<S,A extends aa_i_Action>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the state type.
    A - the action type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    aa_PolicyEvaluationModified

    public interface aa_i_PolicyEvaluation<S,A extends aa_i_Action>
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 656.

    Given a policy πi, calculate Ui=Uπi, the utility of each state if πi were to be executed.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly, Ravi Mohan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<S,Double> evaluate(Map<S,A> pi_i, Map<S,Double> U, mp_i_MDP<S,A> mdp)
      Policy evaluation: given a policy πi, calculate Ui=Uπi, the utility of each state if πi were to be executed.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        Map<S,Double> evaluate(Map<S,A> pi_i,
                     Map<S,Double> U,
                     mp_i_MDP<S,A> mdp)
        Policy evaluation: given a policy πi, calculate Ui=Uπi, the utility of each state if πi were to be executed.
        Parameters:
        pi_i - a policy vector indexed by state
        U - a vector of utilities for states in S
        mdp - an MDP with states S, actions A(s), transition model P(s'|s,a)
        Returns:
        Ui=Uπi, the utility of each state if πi were to be executed.
